tool_description: Extracts metadata information from wallet backup files including creation date, version, wallet name, and configuration settings.

backup_data.description: Parsed backup file data as JSON string

wallet_type.description: Type of wallet: electrum, exodus, metamask, trust_wallet, generic

error_messages: Invalid backup data: Backup data must be valid JSON format.
Unsupported wallet type: Wallet type must be one of [electrum, exodus, metamask, trust_wallet, generic].
Metadata extraction failed: Unable to extract metadata from the provided backup data.
usage: Provide backup_data as JSON string and specify wallet_type. Returns extracted metadata information about the wallet.

wallet_name.description: Name or label of the wallet

encryption_enabled.description: Whether the wallet has encryption enabled

account_count.description: Number of accounts in the wallet
